job.title: Software Engineer - Java Developer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrEnterprise Finance amp Information Technology offers technology and services that exceed Wells Fargo customers expectations and directly enable them to succeed financially We interact with customers more than 12 billion times a year through instore online ATM and telephone transactions We impact customers directly through systems availability and security as well as indirectly through our business partners who offer and deliver a myriad of products and services that meet customers financial needs We provide a competitive advantage for the company through excellence in fundamentals integrated partnerships and our talented and engaged team membersbrbrThe Virtual Image Processing Exception Resolution Systems VIPERS team is seeking an Software Engineer to support 8 applications within the payment processing platform VIPERS is part of the PVSI  Branch group within Wells Fargo This team works in a virtual environment across multiple time zones occasionally requiring a nonstandard work schedule in support of the applications that processes electronic transactions 24 x7 in support of our enterprise and customer needs This position requires someone that can be flexible wants to be part of a dynamic team and is able to manage multiple priorities and tasks at the same timebrbrThe Software Engineer position will be required to perform moderate to complex development for in house and third party vendor applications This role develops and implements complex internet and intranet applications on one or more platforms Acts as an escalation point for production troubleshooting guidance provides training and mentoring to less experienced developers Evaluates systems specifications for client area web site requirements and determines and implements the most efficient and costeffective softwarepackage solution Researches and tracks new web technologies develops service applications and analyzes business requirements as they pertain to webbased systems Responsible for system quality assurance and consistency with installation and security policy and standardsbrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli5 years of software engineering experiencelili5 years of Java experiencebrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliAn industrystandard technology certificationliliStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillslili2 years of Hibernate experiencelili4 years of JavaScript framework experience YUI Angular Nodelili4 years of Cascading Style Sheets experiencelili4 years of Spring experiencelili4  years of MultiThreading experiencebrliulstronguOther Desired QualificationsbrustrongulliKnowledge and understanding of LinuxliliStrong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracyliliAbility to identify and evaluate trends isolate root cause and provide swiftthorough resolutionliliAbility to interact with all levels of an organizationliliFlexibility to address incidents as needed 24 hours a dayliliAbility to work on call as assignedbrliulstrongJob ExpectationsbrstrongulliFlexibility to address incidents as needed 24 hours a dayliliAbility to work on call as assignedbrliulstrongDisclaimerbrbrstrongAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local state and Federal law including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance ActbrbrRelevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and womenbrbrWells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer
